```{r setup message = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(socviz)
library(wdpar)
```

```{r load-data, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
wdpa_raw <- read_csv("data/WDPA_Mar2022_Public_csv.csv")
```

```{r clean-data}
wdpa <- wdpa_raw %>%
  select(TYPE, WDPAID, NAME, DESIG_ENG, DESIG_TYPE, MARINE, GIS_AREA, STATUS,
         STATUS_YR, GOV_TYPE, OWN_TYPE)
```

```{r wdpar-setup}
usa_raw_pa_data <- wdpa_fetch(
  "USA", wait = TRUE, download_dir = rappdirs::user_data_dir("wdpar")
  )

usa_pa_data <- wdpa_clean(usa_raw_pa_data)
```
